instructions.name: admin_force_cancel
docs: Admin force-cancel: mark round as Cancelled (vault funds stay in escrow for refunds).

instructions.name: auto_claim
docs: Anyone can trigger claim — funds go to the on-chain winner.

accounts.name: vault_usdc_ata
docs: Vault USDC ATA owned by the round PDA.

accounts.name: winner_usdc_ata
docs: Winner's USDC ATA — validated in handler against round.winner.

accounts.name: vrf_payer_usdc_ata
docs: Optional: VRF payer's USDC ATA for reimbursement.

instructions.name: cancel_round
docs: Cancel participation — refund USDC from vault while round is still Open.

accounts.name: vault_usdc_ata
docs: Vault USDC ATA owned by the round PDA.

accounts.name: vault_usdc_ata
docs: Vault USDC ATA owned by the round PDA — verified in handler.

accounts.name: vrf_payer_usdc_ata
docs: Optional: VRF payer's USDC ATA for reimbursement.

instructions.name: auto_claim_degen_fallback
docs: Anyone can trigger degen fallback claim — funds go to the on-chain winner.

instructions.name: claim_refund
docs: [H-2 fix] Participant self-refund from a force-cancelled round (escrow pattern).

accounts.name: user
docs: Participant self-service refund.

accounts.name: vault_usdc_ata
docs: Vault USDC ATA owned by the round PDA.

accounts.name: user_usdc_ata
docs: User's USDC ATA to receive the refund.

instructions.name: close_participant
docs: Close a participant PDA after round is Claimed/Cancelled. Returns rent to participant.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call (typically crank service).

accounts.name: user
docs: The participant's wallet — receives the rent lamports.

instructions.name: close_round
docs: Close round account + vault ATA after Claimed/Cancelled. Returns rent to recipient.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call, but rent goes to `recipient`.

accounts.name: recipient
docs: Where the recovered rent lamports go.

accounts.name: vault_usdc_ata
docs: Vault USDC ATA owned by the round PDA — must be empty.

accounts.name: round
docs: No seeds constraint here: callback does not include round_id arg.

accounts.name: vrf_program_identity
docs: VRF program identity PDA — only the VRF program can produce this signature.

accounts.name: round
docs: No seeds constraint — round_id not available from VRF callback args.
PDA verified manually in handler.

errors.name: RoundNotVrfRequested
errors.msg: Round is not in VRF requested state

errors.name: InvalidUsdcBalanceBefore
errors.msg: USDC balance decreased unexpectedly before deposit

errors.name: DepositTooSmall
errors.msg: Deposit too small to mint at least one ticket

errors.name: MaxParticipantsReached
errors.msg: Too many participants for MVP limit

errors.name: RoundNotCloseable
errors.msg: Round is not in a closeable state (must be Claimed or Cancelled)

errors.name: VaultNotEmpty
errors.msg: Vault still has tokens — cannot close

errors.name: RoundExpired
errors.msg: Round timer has expired — no more deposits accepted

errors.name: ParticipantRoundMismatch
errors.msg: Participant does not belong to this round

errors.name: MaxDepositExceeded
errors.msg: Deposit exceeds max per-user limit for this round

errors.name: ParticipantNotEmpty
errors.msg: Participant still has refundable balance or tickets

errors.name: CancelNotAllowed
errors.msg: Cannot cancel — other participants have deposits in this round

errors.name: DegenClaimLocked
errors.msg: Classic claim is locked because degen mode was selected

errors.name: DegenVrfNotRequested
errors.msg: Degen VRF has not been requested for this round

errors.name: DegenVrfNotReady
errors.msg: Degen VRF is not ready yet

errors.name: DegenFallbackTooEarly
errors.msg: Degen fallback is not yet available

fields.name: max_deposit_per_user
docs: Max USDC (raw, 6 decimals) a single participant can deposit per round. 0 = unlimited.

fields.name: max_deposit_per_user
docs: Max USDC (raw) a single user can deposit per round. 0 = unlimited.

types.name: Round
docs: Round account — zero-copy to avoid stack overflow (~21KB).
All instructions must use `AccountLoader<'info, Round>` and call `.load()` / `.load_mut()`.

fields.name: max_deposit_per_user
docs: Max USDC (raw) per user per round. 0 = unlimited.
